history.comment: Request created via Streamlit app.

This bug report about a `StreamlitDuplicateElementKey` error has been analyzed. The root cause is a redundant rendering loop in `task_status.py`. A high-priority task (#147) has been created to remove this loop. Archiving this request as it has been converted into an actionable task.
